response.overview: The special "Hef's Runaway Bride" provides an intimate look at the events leading up to the breakup between Hugh Hefner and Crystal Harris. The special includes behind-the-scenes footage, exclusive interviews, and emotional insights from both parties. It covers the trip where Harris first discovered her newfound passion for the music industry, the stress of wedding preparations, and the final decision to cancel the wedding. The special also captures the support from Hefner's family and friends, including Holly Madison and Kendra Wilkinson, as well as Harris' best friend and maid of honor, Anna Berglund. The episode is a testament to the unexpected nature of the breakup and the impact it had on both parties and their supporters.
response.title: Hef's Runaway Bride
